archimate:BusinessService.name: Fraud Case
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Service Domain - Fraud Case Fraud decisioning provides an analysis of detected possible fraud in order to guide the correct containment response. The analysis can focus on customer, merchant and other possible sources of fraudulent activity Detailed Summary
This service domain handles the evaluation of detected possible fraud to support an appropriate response to contain the exposure
Example of Use: A fraudulent use of a stolen card is detected and passed for resolution
General Comment: The Fraud Case service domain handles the full analysis of a detected fraud case and orchestrates all resolution actions. This can include making suggestions for changes to production arrangements to reduce exposure to future repeated fraud attempts

Executive Summary This service domain handles the evaluation of detected possible fraud to support an appropriate response to contain the exposure
Examples Of Use Out of pattern card use is detected and the details passed for analysis. The analysis determines there is a high probability of fraud recommending appropriate containment actions
